caller_intent: Thomas Burns is attempting to schedule a meeting with Mr. Cook, following missed calls and expressing urgency to discuss matters.
resolution_steps: Mr. Cook acknowledges the call and mentions he is in a meeting, offering availability up to 10:15 AM.
Thomas Burns confirms he will call back within the next hour if Mr. Cook is unavailable.
Mr. Cook apologizes for prior unavailability and agrees to the tentative follow-up.
summary: The call involves a scheduling discussion between Thomas Burns and Mr. Cook, with no resolution reached but a tentative agreement to reconnect later. Mr. Cook is unavailable for immediate discussion, and Thomas Burns agrees to follow up within an hour.
